summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a potential call and a meeting in London. The email emphasizes confidentiality and includes disclaimers about attorney-client privilege and unauthorized use.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing plans with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, inquiring about a call and discussing plans with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating about personal plans, indicating a social relationship.

keyFacts: The email correspondence is dated October 18, 2009.
Jeffrey Epstein emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication.
Jes Staley expresses a desire to call Epstein the following day.
